title: Naruhodo
description: Naruhodo! é o podcast pra quem tem fome de aprender. Ciência, senso comum, curiosidades e muito mais. Com o leigo curioso, Ken Fujioka, e o cientista PhD, Altay de Souza.

title: NerdCast
description: O mundo vira piada no Jovem Nerd

title: Gugacast
description:
Um talk show onde Guga e seus convidados contam histórias épicas da vida real, enviadas pelos ouvintes. De vez em quando tem também os jogos engraçados, como o Sete Cliques para as Estrelas, ou quadros quase filosóficos como a Análise Musical.

Gugacast é uma produção da Parasol Storytelling.

Saiba mais em gugacast.com

title: The Apology Line
description:
All episodes are available for free, with ad-free episodes available for Wondery+ subscribers.


If you could call a number and say you’re sorry, and no one would know…what would you apologize for? For fifteen years, you could call a number in Manhattan and do just that. This is the story of the line, and the man at the other end who became consumed by his own creation. He was known as “Mr. Apology.” As thousands of callers flooded the line, confessing to everything from shoplifting to infidelity, drug dealing to murder, Mr. Apology realized he couldn’t just listen. He had to do something, even if it meant risking everything. From Wondery the makers of Dr. Death and The Shrink Next Door, comes a story about empathy, deception and obsession. Marissa Bridge, who knew Mr. Apology better than anyone, hosts this six episode series.

title: 99Vidas - Nostalgia e Videogames
description: Um divertido podcast semanal sobre videogames e nostalgia dos anos 80, 90 e 2000.
